Rodimus:

Rodimus heard an alarm inside same room where Windlord was, he wa=
lked toward the computer and typed some buttons and knew that an Maximal wa=
s in planet, he quikly opened a com link tom Malice and said "Malice quickl=
y took a MAximal with you and go to pick anew maximal in  this coordinates =
and come back to base... it seens that a new comer is in the planet"


  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Sunday, February 13, 2005 8:25 PM
  Subject: Silence



  A pod =
that had fallen from the sky, long since forgotten.  The pod
  stayed in st=
atis mode for all this time. Now, as the programs dictate,
  the bot awaken=
s.  

  The optics flicker. The hydrolics in the joints move.  The spark pu=
mps
  mech fluid.  Power levels rise and programs reactive.  The life of th=
e
  bot restarts and the Matrix wills another to join the fight of the
  un=
iverse for the universe. 

  The pod opens. A hand reaches up and lightly c=
lasps the rim.  Sitting
  up, the bot looks about.  Blue sky, white clouds =
float over head.  The
  sun shines down warmth and light.  A gentle breeze =
caresses the face
  plates of the bot. A scent on the wind, barely noticibl=
e, but there
  all the same.  Causion stirs in the mind of the bot.  Optics=
 focus,
  autio sencors adjust to listen for the slightest noise.  The bot
=
  stands up, not a sound is made.  She stands in white and gold
  transmeta=
l skin.  Her form small, yet powerful.  She looks up again. 
  With a sigh,=
 transforms into BARN OWL form and takes to the skies. Not
  a sound is mad=
e as she changes her shape.  She rises to just above the
  tree tops and sl=
owly surveys her new home.  

  She lets her talons spread as she glides do=
wn silently and perches on
  a tree branch high in the trees.   She looks a=
bout her and wonders how
  she came to be here.  She checks her programs, a=
ll seem to be
  functional except her mission logs where wiped out during h=
er
  transport.  On her left ankle, she could see a symbol. It was Maximal.=

  But she knew not what it meant.  She searched her memory banks for
  her=
 identity in hopes it would give her a clue as to why she was
  there.  Her=
 name, was "SILENCE".   Her programmed instincts told her
  to seek out oth=
er maximals. Other than that, she knew not what to do.  

  She spread her =
soft white wings and let her body take to the wind. 
  Her form glided effo=
rtlessly back towards the pod.  She landed on the
  edge and with her beak,=
 she hit the homing beacon on the pod.  A
  maximal signal would be sent ou=
t. With luck, they would find her soon.
  With that accomplished, she flew =
up back into the trees and hid.  She
  knew that if maximals could find her=
 signal, others might too.  She
  hid herself in the trees, but kept a shar=
p owl eye on the pod.  
  She waited, she watched, in perfect...silence.
